analyzed: sngags brjod de/_phyi dang nang gi dngos po stong par bsgom zhes bstan to/_/

analyzed: shes rab ral gri mda' gzhu thogs/_/rdo rje skyil krung rdzogs sangs rgyas/_/

translated: The line “The meaning of the four mudras is taught”

original: zhes pas yum bzhi'i phyag rgya 'phro 'du dang bcas pa'i byin brlabs bstan pa
analyzed: zhes pas yum bzhi'i phyag rgya 'phro 'du dang bcas pa'i byin brlabs bstan pa
translated: refers to the blessing of the four mothers, together with the emanation and reabsorption of the mudras.🔽The line “Various emanations are sent out to the ten directions”

original: yin no/_/phyogs bcur sprul pa sna tshhogs 'gyed/_/ces pas sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' dang khro bo dang khro mo dang lha mo rnams thugs ka nas spro
analyzed: yin no/_/phyogs bcur sprul pa sna tshhogs 'gyed/_/ces pas sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' dang khro bo dang khro mo dang lha mo rnams thugs ka nas spro
translated: refers to the emanation of buddhas, bodhisattvas, wrathful males, wrathful females, and goddesses from the heart.

original: zhes pa'o/_/de nas mdun du pad+ma dang zla ba la ye shes sems dpa' spyan drangs
analyzed: zhes pa'o/_/de nas mdun du pad+ma dang zla ba la ye shes sems dpa' spyan drangs
translated: Then, in front of you, on a lotus and moon, invite the wisdom being.

original: te/_dbang bskur ba dang mchod pa dang /_bstod pa gong bzhin byas te ye
analyzed: te/_dbang bskur ba dang mchod pa dang /_bstod pa gong bzhin byas te ye
translated: Confer empowerment, make offerings, and praise as above.

original: shes sems dpa' de la bltas la/_dgug cing rang lus la gnyis su med par
analyzed: shes sems dpa' de la bltas la/_dgug cing rang lus la gnyis su med par
translated: Then, looking at that wisdom being, summon it and make it nondual with your own body.

original: bsgom zhes pas gnyis su med par byas te/_rdo rje rin chen dbang bskur dpal/_/
analyzed: bsgom zhes pas gnyis su med par byas te/_rdo rje rin chen dbang bskur dpal/_/
translated: The line “Glorious one, with the vajra jewel empowerment”🔽means that light from the heart invites

original: sangs rgyas mnga' bdag cod pan can/_/zhes pas snying ga'i 'od kyis bskul te/
analyzed: sangs rgyas mnga' bdag cod pan can/_/zhes pas snying ga'i 'od kyis bskul te/
translated: the buddhas.

original: bum pa'i chus dbang bskur bas rigs lnga'i dbu rgyan dang ldan pa zhes bstan to/_/
analyzed: bum pa'i chus dbang bskur bas rigs lnga'i dbu rgyan dang ldan pa zhes bstan to/_/
translated: The line “Empowered with the vase water, possessing the crown of the five families” teaches that.

original: sprul pa'i 'khor lo sna tshhogs 'chang /_/zhes pas rdo rje 'khor lo'i phyag rgya bcas
analyzed: sprul pa'i 'khor lo sna tshhogs 'chang /_/zhes pas rdo rje 'khor lo'i phyag rgya bcas
translated: The line “Holder of the various emanated wheels” means to make the mudra of the vajra wheel.

original: la sngags dang bcas pas dkyil 'khor gyi tshhul du sangs rgyas thams cad sprul
analyzed: la sngags dang bcas pas dkyil 'khor gyi tshhul du sangs rgyas thams cad sprul
translated: The line “Emanating all buddhas in the maṇḍala” teaches that.🔽The meaning of that will be explained below.

original: lo zhes bstan to/_/de'i don ni 'og nas 'chad do/_/bdag rig gzhan rig
analyzed: lo zhes bstan to/_/de'i don ni 'og nas 'chad do/_/bdag rig gzhan rig
translated: The line “Self-awareness, awareness of others, and awareness of all”🔽means that all should be understood as emanations of the mind.

original: thams cad pa/_/shes dang shes bya'i bdag po mchog_/ces pas thams cad
analyzed: thams cad pa/_/shes dang shes bya'i bdag po mchog_/ces pas thams cad
translated: The line “The supreme lord of the knower and the known” teaches that.

original: sems kyi sprul par shes par bya'o/_/de ltar rdzogs pa dang mtshhan sngags bzlas
analyzed: sems kyi sprul par shes par bya'o/_/de ltar rdzogs pa dang mtshhan sngags bzlas
translated: The line “Having completed that, recite the mantra and read the signs” means that once the maṇḍala is completed, the mantra should be recited and the signs read.

original: shing mtshhan bklag par bya'o/_/de lta bu yon tan las kyang rigs kyi bu'am
analyzed: shing mtshhan bklag par bya'o/_/de lta bu yon tan las kyang rigs kyi bu'am
translated: The line “Son of a good family, also from those qualities” teaches that.

original: rigs kyi bu mo gang la gsang sngags kyi spyad pa spyod pa gang la la/_bcom
analyzed: rigs kyi bu mo gang la gsang sngags kyi spyad pa spyod pa gang la la/_bcom
translated: For any son or daughter of good family who practices the secret mantra, the Blessed One🔽has said, I will be their companion.

original: 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi mtshhan yang dag par brjod pa'i cho ga mdo dang bsres pa/
analyzed: 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi mtshhan yang dag par brjod pa'i cho ga mdo dang bsres pa/
translated: The Sutra-integrated Ritual of the Noble Mañjuśrī's True Repute

original: ldan 'das ye shes sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gnyis su med pa'i don dam pa'i ming gi gtshug gi nor bu 'di thams cad yongs
analyzed: ldan 'das ye shes sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gnyis su med pa'i don dam pa'i ming gi gtshug gi nor bu 'di thams cad yongs
translated: This jewel of the ultimate name, the inseparable body of all tathāgatas, the blessed wisdom being,🔽is completely perfect, equal, without excess or deficiency, with these very verses and syllables.

original: su rdzogs pa dang mnyams shing lhag chad med par tshhigs su bcad pa'i tshhig dang / yi ge 'bru 'di dag nyid kyis nyin gcig bzhin du dus gsum du 'chang ba dang / kun chub par byed pa dang /_gzhan dag la yang dam tshhig ji lta ba bzhin du
analyzed: su rdzogs pa dang mnyams shing lhag chad med par tshhigs su bcad pa'i tshhig dang / yi ge 'bru 'di dag nyid kyis nyin gcig bzhin du dus gsum du 'chang ba dang / kun chub par byed pa dang /_gzhan dag la yang dam tshhig ji lta ba bzhin du
translated: By upholding and mastering these three times each day, and by teaching them to others according to the commitments,

original: ston pa dang ming gi don gang yang rung ba re re nas kyang 'jam dpal ye shes
analyzed: ston pa dang ming gi don gang yang rung ba re re nas kyang 'jam dpal ye shes
translated: and by visualizing the body of Mañjuśrījñānasattva from each of the meaningful names,

original: sems dpa'i sku la dmigs te zhes bya ba dang /_rtshe gcig tu bsgom pa de la ni
analyzed: sems dpa'i sku la dmigs te zhes bya ba dang /_rtshe gcig tu bsgom pa de la ni
translated: and by meditating on this for one lifetime,

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa dang /_gzhan yang yon tan las/_nyin gcig bzhin
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa dang /_gzhan yang yon tan las/_nyin gcig bzhin
translated: Furthermore, from the qualities,

original: du dus gsum du mnyam par yi dam du lan gsum du 'don tam/_glegs
analyzed: du dus gsum du mnyam par yi dam du lan gsum du 'don tam/_glegs
translated: daily, three times, recite the pledge three times,🔽or read aloud from a book.

original: bam du byas pa la kha ton du klog cing brjod pas bcom ldan 'das ye shes sems
analyzed: bam du byas pa la kha ton du klog cing brjod pas bcom ldan 'das ye shes sems
translated: By reciting, focus on the form of the transcendent conqueror, the awareness being,

original: dpa'i gzugs la dmigs te/_gzugs dang gnyis su  mthun par bsam
analyzed: dpa'i gzugs la dmigs te/_gzugs dang gnyis su  mthun par bsam
translated: and meditate in accord with the two forms.

original: gtan du byed pa ni 'dul ba'i dbang gi phyir ring por mi thogs pas de nyid
analyzed: gtan du byed pa ni 'dul ba'i dbang gi phyir ring por mi thogs pas de nyid
translated: Since it is not long before the attainment of control,🔽the emanated form body will be seen.

original: du sprul pa'i gzugs kyi lus mthong bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don 'di yin te/
analyzed: du sprul pa'i gzugs kyi lus mthong bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don 'di yin te/
translated: This is the meaning.

original: mtshhan nyid kyi _cho ga rdzogs shing dmigs pa la yun ring du gnas pa des rdo rje
analyzed: mtshhan nyid kyi _cho ga rdzogs shing dmigs pa la yun ring du gnas pa des rdo rje
translated: One who has completed the rite of characteristics and abides for a long time in the visualization,🔽having formed the mudra of the vajra wheel,🔽recites: Mañjuśrīdhṛk oṃ vigiśvari muṃ

original: 'khor lo'i phyag rgya bcas la/_many+dzu shri d+hih__o wa gi shwa ri mum/_man+da la tshakra hum
analyzed: 'khor lo'i phyag rgya bcas la/_many+dzu shri d+hih__o wa gi shwa ri mum/_man+da la tshakra hum
translated: maṇḍala cakra hūṃ

original: / zhes pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi rnam par
analyzed: / zhes pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi rnam par
translated: and all tathāgatas transform into the form of noble Mañjuśrī.

original: sprul la/_phyag sngon du 'gro bas mchod pa la sogs pas bdag cag gi lus de
analyzed: sprul la/_phyag sngon du 'gro bas mchod pa la sogs pas bdag cag gi lus de
translated: Then, having made offerings and so forth, emanate bodies equal to the number of the🔽good qualities of the buddhas and bodhisattvas.

original: dang mnyam par sprul te/_mtshhan gyi don re re nas bstod la yon tan rnam pa
analyzed: dang mnyam par sprul te/_mtshhan gyi don re re nas bstod la yon tan rnam pa
translated: Then, having praised each of the good qualities of the buddhas and bodhisattvas,

original: 'di ltar smos pas bdag dang gzhan la dpag tu med pa 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/
analyzed: 'di ltar smos pas bdag dang gzhan la dpag tu med pa 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/
translated: say, “By my having recited these good qualities, may immeasurable good qualities arise in myself and others.”🔽In brief, you will not be far from attaining the praise of the holy ones,

original: mdor na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ring po mi thogs par dam pas bsngags pa
analyzed: mdor na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ring po mi thogs par dam pas bsngags pa
translated: the state of omniscience.

original: thob par 'gyur ro/_/yang na gsang sngags kyi rim pa thob par 'gyur ro/
analyzed: thob par 'gyur ro/_/yang na gsang sngags kyi rim pa thob par 'gyur ro/
translated: Or, you will attain the stages of the secret mantra.🔽Drink the nectar of the holy lineage gurus.

original: dam pa brgyud pa'i bla ma'i bdud rtshi 'thungs/_/'gro ba'i sdug bsngal nad🔽kyis gzir gyur la/_/dus gsum sangs rgyas rnams kyi bstod tshhig 'di/_/
analyzed: dam pa brgyud pa'i bla ma'i bdud rtshi 'thungs/_/'gro ba'i sdug bsngal nad kyis gzir gyur la/_/dus gsum sangs rgyas rnams kyi bstod tshhig 'di/_/
translated: For those who are afflicted by the sickness of the suffering of the world,🔽I, like the king of physicians, will explain this praise of the buddhas of the three times.

original: sman pa'i rgyal po bzhin du bdag gis bshad/_/'phrod pa'i sman bzhin kun la
analyzed: sman pa'i rgyal po bzhin du bdag gis bshad/_/'phrod pa'i sman bzhin kun la
translated: May it be like medicine that is suitable for everyone,🔽and may they attain the immortality of nonconceptual wisdom.

original: phan gyur nas/_/mi rtog ye shes 'chi med thob par shog_/'phags pa 'jam
analyzed: phan gyur nas/_/mi rtog ye shes 'chi med thob par shog_/'phags pa 'jam
translated: The Praise of the Exalted One, Mañjuśrī,

original: dpal gyi mtshhan yang dag par brjod pa'i mdo don mdor bsdus pa'i cho ga sgyu
analyzed: dpal gyi mtshhan yang dag par brjod pa'i mdo don mdor bsdus pa'i cho ga sgyu

analyzed: thabs mdo dang bsres pa/_slob dpon 'jam dpal bshes gnyen gyis mdzad pa jo gas //so//
